greenmirror.commands

Class FlushCommandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenmirror.CommandHandler
      • greenmirror.commands.FlushCommandHandler

  • public class FlushCommandHandler
extends CommandHandler
    The handler that creates a new sub-queue of visualizations. This command is received from the client.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal
